item.title: Confidence intervals rather than P values: estimation rather than hypothesis testing
item.description: M J Gardner, D G Altman “Confidence intervals rather than P values: estimation rather than hypothesis testing” (1986) // BMJ. Publisher: BMJ. Vol. 292. No 6522. Pp. 746–750.
